item.description:
On-water practices are well underway, and we're getting ready for next race in Hartford! All paddlers, regardless of experience are welcome, including first time paddlers! It's a lot of fun, not to mention a great workout. Bring clothes you don't mind getting wet, non cotton synthetic material recommended. Paddles and life jackets are provided.

Worried you'll be the only one there, based on the meetup rsvp? We actually have between 20-40 people at each practice, so just because the meetup says 1-2 people are attending doesn't mean that's actually the case!

Email one of the meetup organizers or RSVP to the event to get started!
item.name: Saturday Practice (Introductory Session)
